text: Tarapara tamra dujana calate lagalena ye paryanta na tamra ese paumchalena eka saharera adhibasidera kache, tamra era lokadera kache khabara ca'ilena, kintu tara e dujanera atitheyata karate asbikara karala. Tarapara tamra tate peye gelena ekati deyala ya pare yabara upakrama karachila, kaje'i tini ta khara kare dilena. Tini balalena -- ''apani yadi ca'itena tabe era jan'ye abasya parisramika grahana karate paratena.â€™â€™
